attributes.action: Car insurance for age 20 and under to be under £1500 a year.
attributes.additional_details: A young driver has to pay over £3000 for a car which is worth £800 which £3000 is a high amount for someone who is 19  i would like the government to ban insurance companies from charging over £1500 for new drivers first car so more people can afford to be on the road.
attributes.background: To ban insurance companies from charging over 1500 for first cars for drivers 20 and under.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Cap the cost of car insurance for young drivers.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/580094
